securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y upgrade
apt -y install unzip python3-pip openjdk-11-jdk-headless build-essential libgl1-mesa-glx
curl -s https://d2s8p88vqu9w66.cloudfront.net/releases/greengrass-nucleus-latest.zip > greengrass-nucleus-latest.zip
unzip greengrass-nucleus-latest.zip -d GreengrassCore && rm greengrass-nucleus-latest.zip
java -Droot="/greengrass/v2" -Dlog.store=FILE   -jar ./GreengrassCore/lib/Greengrass.jar   --aws-region
